mapper.insert: insert into sub (item_num,main_category,sub_category,mart_subject, board_thumbnail, board_thumbnail_ori, mart_name, mart_addr, mart_ori,mart_del, mart_deliverycost, item_name1,item_price1, item_name2,item_price2, item_name3,item_price3, item_name4,item_price4, item_name5,item_price5, item_name6,item_price6, mart_prod,item_name, item_origin, item_exp, item_storage,board_content, upfile1,upfile1_ori, upfile2,upfile2_ori, upfile3,upfile3_ori, upfile4,upfile4_ori, board_date) values (sub_seq.nextval,#{main_category},#{sub_category},#{mart_subject}, #{board_thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{board_thumbnail_ori,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mart_name},#{mart_addr}, #{mart_ori},#{mart_del}, #{mart_deliverycost}, #{item_name1},#{item_price1}, #{item_name2},#{item_price2}, #{item_name3},#{item_price3}, #{item_name4},#{item_price4}, #{item_name5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item_price5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item_name6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item_price6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mart_prod},#{item_name}, #{item_origin},#{item_exp}, #{item_storage},#{board_content}, #{upfile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{upfile1_ori,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upfile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{upfile2_ori,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upfile3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{upfile3_ori,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upfile4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{upfile4_ori,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate )
